name: MrCodeInc Blog
tagline: I blog about code and stuff.
body:
Hello and welcome to the @MrCodeInc Blog! I blog about **code and stuff.**

# What do I code?

I want to code something awesome and amazing..but I have NO CLUE what to code. That's where **YOU** Come in! **YOU** gotta tell me what to code! you can contact me if you have any idea on what to code by using [this link!](https://github.com/MrCodeInc/mrcodeinc.github.io/issues/new) Just create a new issue with your idea on this repository and **YOU** are set. (**YOUR POST WILL BE REVIEWED**) That's all folks! **K Bye.**

# PHP CALC: A DUMB SIDE PROJECT.

So yesterday night I made a calculator in PHP for no reason and now its on heroku for **YOU** to see. So yeah if you want to screw with it you can find it [here.](https://phpcalc.herokuapp.com/) That's all. **K Bye**

# My other amazing new project thing.

Hello I made a new project call Virus Simulator. It's cool so check it out [here.](https://mrcodeinc.github.io/virussimulator/) **K Bye.**

# Hello World?

Hello this is my first post here. Yeah that's it. **K Bye.**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
